name: Combat and Fitness
meta_title: Combat and Fitness | Muay Thai & HIIT Training | Changing Rooms & Showers | Flexible Hours | Limassol
meta_description: Discover Combat and Fitness in Limassol. Specializing in Muay Thai, HIIT Training, Functional Training, equipped with changing rooms, showers, toilets, open Monday-Friday: 6:30 - 9:15 (Morning), 16:00 - 20:00 (Afternoon) | Saturday: 8:30 - 9:30 (Morning). Located in Limassol, contact Contact for details for details.
description: Located on Vasileos Pavlou 44, Combat and Fitness delivers authentic muay thai instruction in Limassol. Specializing in Muay Thai, HIIT Training, and Functional Training, this facility caters to all fitness levels. Operating 6:30 to 9:15, perfect for morning and evening workouts. Perfect for families with dedicated kids' classes and family-friendly facilities. Memberships from €2 monthly with flexible payment options.
